resources.string: Note: This allows for syncing with YouTube Music. This is NOT changeable later.

This is an ADVANCED login method. As an alternative to the web portal, you may directly enter or update your login token here. For example, this can speed up logging in on multiple devices. Please note that any invalid token formats the app fails to parse will not be accepted

Note: Your account must be linked to a phone number and verified on YouTube Music to change playlist cover.

EXPERIMENTAL: Detect language line by line
The Cyrillic language will be detected line by line instead of the entire song.

This is a hit or miss experimental feature. 

By default, language is determined from the whole song, but with this option on, it will be determined line by line instead. This will allow multi-language songs to work BUT the language might not always be correct (for example if there is a Ukrainian lyric that doesn't contain any Ukrainian-specific letters, it might be romanized as Russian instead). 

If you do not have issues, it is recommended to keep this option off.
Use the offload audio path for audio playback. Disabling this may increase power usage but can be useful if you experience issues with audio playback or post processing

Live Media provides a dynamic notification and status bar pill for Vivi Music playback.
Display cover art in the notification
Hide when notification shade is open
This app requires Notification Access to detect playback and manage the Live Media notification.
This app requires Accessibility Access to detect Quick Settings.

Live Media is designed for Android 16 and above. On your current version of Android, it will function as a standard notification and may not provide the full Dynamic Media experience (like the Status Bar Pill).
Configure content for the status bar pill
